title: Luka Magnotta /// Part 2 /// 123
description:
Luka Magnotta /// Part 2 /// 123

Part 2 of 2

Truecrimegarage.com

On May 26th, 2012 people all over the world could view a short video titled 1 lunatic/ 1 Ice pick on the Internet. What the video showed was horrific and unspeakable. Many that viewed it realized they had just seen a genuine snuff film. Days later body parts were mailed to several different government agencies and schools. The manhunt was on for the person who not only published the video but played the role of the killer. Today we discuss the very strange case of Luka Magnotta.

Beer of the week - Cherry Spadina Monkey by Indie AlehouseGarage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
